name: Rea
description:
Play as Beatrece, one of the last humans left on Earth.

Follow her journey throughout Rea.

Fight for her life, and try to survive.

Rea is a fantasy post-apocalyptic game based on an original story. It was developed throughout a semester by two game development students. 

An atmospheric, dialog-based game with a branching narrative and two endings.
